Dominga está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y por ayudarla con el crecimiento y fortalecimiento de sus actividades.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member is Señora Dominga, she belongs to the communal bank Reyna de los Angeles (Queen of the Angels) in the province of Urbamba in Cusco, Perú.  The member continues making a living through the production and the wholesale of vegetables like legumes and garden vegetables, and she distributes them in the different markets of the region.  But she also makes a living by raising small animals like guinea pigs and chickens.  With this opportunity Dominga will invest the requested loan by buying various products like tomatoes, onions, and carrots, in order to stock up her offerings.

Dominga is very grateful to Kiva for allowing her to provide a better quality of life to her family and for helping her with the growth and strengthening of her work.  The member is grateful for the loan and promises to complete her repayments according to the timeline.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as tomatoes, onions and carrots.

loans.name: Angela Edamira

texts.es: Angela Edamira de 62 años de edad soltera del municipio de chinandega , tiene por actividad ecomomica la venta de ropa,tiempo de tener el negocio 17 años , el negocio consiste en la venta de : ropa variada, camisas, pantalones faldas, vestidos, camisetas, zapatos, chinelas el cual distribuye de forma ambulante, herramienta de trabajo que la inicio de tener un medio de trabajo para poder sacar  a sus hijos adelante, en la actulidad ha cumplido con sus sueños como es ver forjados a sus hijos.
texts.en: Angela Edamira is 62 years old. She is single and lives in the town of Chinandega. Her business is selling clothing products. She has had the business for 17 years. The business consists of selling a variety of clothing, shirts, pants, skirts, dresses, T-shirt, shoes, and flip-flops, which she sells as an itinerant vendor. She created this source of employment to have a means of work to be able to raise her children. Now she has achieved her dream, to see her children grown.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as skirts, dress shirts, pants, dresses, shoes and sandals

loans.name: Juama Irna

texts.es:
LA SEÑORA,JUANA IRMA CUENTA CON U  PEQUEÑO NEGOCIO DE VENTA I COMPRA DE ROPA USADA,JUANA IRMA LLEVA MAS DE 2 AÑOS DEDACANDOCE A ESE NEGOCIO
DEL CUAL A PODIDO SOLVENTAR ALGUNOS GASTOS DE SU CASA
JUANA IRMA TAMBIEN SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE HELADOS 
CON EL CUAL OBTIENE UN NINGRESO EXTRA A SI HOGAR
JUANA DECEA PODER INVERTIR EN ROPA USADA DE TODA VARIEDAD
Y ASI PODER COMPETIR Y DETACARCE EN SU RAMO
ASI MISMO PODER TENER UNA MEJOR CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
Juana Irma has a small business buying and selling used clothing.  She has been in this business for two years and it has enabled her to cover some of her household expenses.  She also sells iced treats which makes her extra income for her household.

Juana Irma would like to invest in buying all kinds of used clothing so that she can be competitive and stand out in her field.  She would also like to be able to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Sayramby

texts.en: Sayramby is a woman who is trying to find new ways to earn income. She is beautiful, jolly and plodding. She had a business selling vegetables, but it did not satisfy her. Sayramby is going to organize a new business selling fabrics. She has enough experience to develop a new business. Her selling place will be situated in the local market. She must work hard because she is the only breadwinner in the family, as she is divorced. She has a child and tries to do the best for him. She is asking for a loan to buy goods for the new business. She waits your help and support.

loans.use: To buy goods for a new business

loans.name: Khnoeurn

texts.en: Khnoeurn, is 40 years old, living in a rural area of the Ponhea Krek district of Kompong Cham province, Cambodia. She has one daughter and one son, both of whom are still her dependents and in school. To support the family, she has been involved in rice farming and cassava planting for twenty years. She can earn about 63,600 KHR per day from her current business. Khnoeurn is applying for her first loan of 3,000,000 KHR with VisionFund. With this loan she is going to buy fertilizers for her field. She hopes to earn more income from the cassava business, live in a better conditions, and keep the children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Gloria tiene la edad de 43, hoy en día madre soltera, con dos hijos estudiantes, su negocio lo inicio hace veinte años, en el norte en apawas con dinero que mi esposo dio y ahorros, su negocio es la venta de queso, cuajada, crema al por mayor, obteniendo mejores ganancias. Para ella fue difícil la muerte de su marido, porque era él, quien le ayudaba en su negocio, a vender, a cargar, ahora paga un ayudante.
Este financiamiento es con el propósito de comprar más queso en Quinientas libras y trescientas cuajada, para fortalecer su negocio, el cual vende en un mercado de la capital todos los días al por mayor y libreado. Contenta por esta inversión y Afodenic por este crédito otorgado, permitiendo obtener mejores resultados económicos en su hogar.
texts.en: 43-year-old Gloria is a single mother [widowed] and has two children who are students. She started her business twenty years ago, in the north, in Apawas, with money that her husband gave her and some savings. Her business is selling cheese, cuajada and cream wholesale which makes her good profits. Her husband's death was hard on her because he used to help her in her business, selling and carrying. Now she pays an assistant. Gloria's aim for this loan is to buy more cheese in 500lb lots and cuajada in 300lb lots, in order to strengthen her business. She sells her products in a market in the capital city. She sells wholesale and by the pound. She is happy to be making this investment and grateful to Afodenic for the loan as it will allow her to make more money for her household.

loans.use: to buy cheese and cuajada

loans.name: 010305-Bắc Sơn- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thu  operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell.

Thu is 41 years old.  She is married and has 2 children..
She is the leader of a 5-member group, the 010305-Bắc Sơn- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. 
Thu  supports 2 dependents with her business in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2008, Thu  joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thu  has successfully repaid 4 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Thu  has been involved in this business for 4 years. The main hardship that Thu  faces in her business is the lack of capital.  In the future, Thu  hopes to maintain  a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase fish to resell.

loans.name: Teresiah

texts.en:
Teresiah is forty-seven years old.  She is widowed and has two children. She runs a farming business.  She has been in this business for thirteen years, earning monthly income if twenty thousand shillings. 

This will be her third loan from KADET LTD, and she plans to use it for purchasing farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer.  She plans to use the anticipated profit to improve her farming.  She hopes to become a competitive farmer in the future.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Nushrivan

texts.en:
Nushrivan is 62 years old, married, and has three children.

He has owned a food market since 1999, selling foodstuffs and fancy goods. He has sufficient experience in this field, a good understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. Nushrivan has a good reputation in the trading sphere. 

He is requesting a loan of AZN 1500 in order to purchase goods for the store and to increase his business to provide a better standard of living for his family.

loans.use: To purchase goods for the store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to renovate the cafeteria

loans.name: 010304-Bắc Sơn- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bích operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell.

Bích is 50 years old.  She is married and has 3 children..
She is the leader of a 6-member group, the 010304-Bắc Sơn- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. 
Bích supports 1 dependent with her business in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.   Two other children are grown up.

In 2002, Bích joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Bích has successfully repaid 4 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Bích has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Bích faces in her business is the lack of capital.  In the future, Bích hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain  a successful business, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase fish to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shelving and to lay flooring

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche,galletas y dulces,la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,por medio de este trbajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y galletas al por mayor.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Tomasa continues to operate her grocery store. She sells products of primary necessity such as rice, sugar, milk, cookies and sweets. Tomasa works from 7:00 am until 8:00 pm. As a result of this work, she advances her children. Tomasa's dream is to expand and improve her grocery store business.

Tomasa is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies at wholesale. She is grateful to all who form part of this dream by this means and she promises to comply with her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, milk, and cookies at wholesale to sell.

loans.name: 010302-Bắc Sơn- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Ngọc operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase net for fishing.

Ngọc is 49 years old.   She is married and has 3 children.  She is the leader of a 5-member group, the 010302-Bắc Sơn- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group.  Ngọc supports 1 dependent with her business in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Two other children are grown up.

In 2008, Ngọc joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Ngọc has successfully repaid 4 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Ngọc has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Ngọc faces in her business is the lack of capital.  In the future, Ngọc hopes for her business to do well, to buy land of her own, and to buy a cell phone.

loans.use: to purchase net for fishing

loans.name: Prima

texts.en: Prima is 46 years old, from Cortes, Bohol. She is married to a carpenter and they have four children together. Her eldest is 18 and her youngest is 3 years old. Prima makes baskets and raises hogs for an income. She is asking for a loan to buy additional stocks of PMI feed necessary to fatten her hogs. A loan will definitely boost her business, she will be spared worrying if she has to buy feed on a per kilo basis. Her income will be for her children's healthy diet and school fees.

loans.use: to buy sacks of PMI feed

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is 37 years old and married to Esther. They are blessed with two children, aged 14 and 10 years. 

Nicholas has been into a green tea leaves selling business for the past three years. He earns a monthly income of KES 20,000 from the business.

This is his third loan of KES 100,000 with KADET LTD after successfully repaying his previous loans. He intends to use the loan for purchasing green tea leaves for resale. 

With the anticipated profits from the business, he plans to save so as to pay school fees for his children and use the remaining amount to sustain his family. 

His hopes and dreams are to own a retail shop and a butchery.

loans.use: to purchase green tea leaves for resale.

loans.name: Qodirjon

texts.ru:
Кодирчон житель города Вахдат. Ему 30 лет. Он живет вместе с женой. У него двое детей. 
Кодирчон занимается животноводством. Он занимается этим видом деятельности четыре года. Первый раз Кодирчон начал свою деятельность в 2009 году, когда он закупил крупнорогатый скот по низкой цене и через несколько месяцев продал по более выгодной цене. 
На сегодняшний день Кодирчон разводит скот у себя дома. 
Кодирчон берет кредит для закупа несколько голов бычков в дальнейшем для продажи.
texts.en: Qodirjon is a resident of the city of Vahdat.  He is 30 years old, lives with his wife, and they have two children.  Qodirjon is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been in this business for four years.  Qodirjon first started his business in 2009, when he purchased cattle at a low price and then sold it several months later at a more advantageous price.  Today, Qodirjon breeds livestock at home.  He is requesting this loan to buy several bulls for future resale.

loans.use: to purchase several bulls

loans.name: Odiljon

texts.en: Odiljon is very successful businessman. For more than 7 years he has been busy with animal husbandry. He has enough experience to develop business and that’s why his business has been developing year by year. He buys cattle, cares for them and then sells to the local market. He has many customers because he sells at a low price. All his customers are happy with his cattle as his cattle are fat and well-cared for. He has a large family.  His wife helps him with the business. They have 6 children and try to do the best for them. He is asking for a loan to buy young cattle for developing the business. He waits your help and support.

loans.use: To buy cattle for developing his business

loans.name: 020309-Bắc Sơn- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Giang operates a food stall/restaurant selling shrimp sauce. She is requesting a loan to purchase shrimp sauce for resale. Giang has been involved in this business for five years.

Giang is 27 years old and she is married with two children.

She is the leader of a 6-member group, the 020309-Bắc Sơn- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. 

Giang supports two dependents with her business in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2011, Giang joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Giang faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Giang hopes to make enough money to provide for her children, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and to buy land of her own.

loans.use: to purchase shrimp sauce for resale.

loans.name: Amivi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de nourriture dans une école de la place depuis 2003, Madame Amivi est mariée à un instituteur et ils ont eu ensemble 03 adorables enfants. Ils sont âgés de 17,14 et 11ans et sont tous sur les bancs de l’école. Elle rencontre par moments un problème de mévente. Elle sollicite ce crédit de WAGES pour s’approvisionner en ingrédients rentrant dans la préparation du jus et de la nourriture. Elle voudrait avoir une activité pérenne et prospère, avoir une vie confortable.
texts.en:
A food seller in a local school since 2003, Ms. Amivi is married to a primary school teacher, and they had three adorable children. They are 17, 14 and 11 years old, who are all in school. 

Ms. Amivi sometimes runs into the problem of a drop in sales. She is requesting this WAGES loan to stock up on ingredients for making beverages and food. She would like to have a sustainable and prosperous business and a comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making beverages and food

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en: Felomina is 49 years, old from Cortes, Bohol. She is married and has seven children. Her husband works as a farmer in Manga, and Felomina helps by raising hogs near her house. She is asking for a loan to buy feed, another piglet to raise, and supplements to prevent diseases that are common to pigs. Felomina hopes that someday she can renovate her barn and she can have more animals to raise for a bigger profit. Her income will be for family daily consumption and school fees.

loans.use: to buy feed, another piglet to raise, and supplements

loans.name: Lawoé

texts.fr: Madame Lawoé est mère de 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. Son conjoint est retraité. Vu que les temps sont difficiles elle voudrait avec l’appui de son mari assurer les besoins nécessaires de ses enfants c’est pour cela elle a commencé depuis 04ans par vendre des détergents en gros à ses clients à domicile. Une personne l’aide et elle rencontre par moment des problèmes de mévente. Elle est à son second crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle veut assurer la pérennité de l’activité et avoir une vie meilleure.
texts.en:
Ms. Lawoé is the mother of three children, of whom two are in school. Her spouse is retired. Given that times are tough, and with the help of her husband, she would like to meet her children's necessary needs. This is why she started selling detergents in bulk four years ago to her customers at her home. One person helps hers, and she sometimes runs into problems with a drop in sales. 

She is on her second WAGES loan and is requesting this loan to stock up on merchandise. She wants to ensure that her business is sustainable and to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy detergents

loans.name: Nasim

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client, 27 years old, and is married. Nasim has been an owner of a motorcycle repair shop since 2000. He sells and repairs motorcycles. He has sufficient experience in this field and a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding area.

He is requesting $3000 as “Youth Loan” in order to pay the annual rent. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent

loans.name: 010104-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyệt works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase poultry and cattle to raise. Nguyệt is 60 years old. She is married and has 2 children. She is the leader of a 4-member group, the 010104-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group.  Nguyệt has her business in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Her children are grown up.

In 2001, Nguyệt joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Nguyệt has successfully repaid 5 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nguyệt has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Nguyệt faces in her business is the lack of capital.
In the future, Nguyệt hopes to maintain  a successful business, to buy land of her own, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and cattle to raise.

loans.name: Mzia

texts.en:
Mzia is 52 years old. She lives in a small village of Samtredia District with her family: her husband,Grigol, her 29-year-old son, her daughter-in-law and her granddaughter. Grigol works at a railway station and gets a monthly salary. Mzia and her son are busy with agricultural activities. They have 4 milking cows and a calf. They produce cheese, part of which is used by the family members and the rest which is sold locally. They also have a plot of land, where nuts are grown. They sell approximately 100 kg of nuts seasonally. 

Mzia’s son wants to become a goldsmith. With the requested credit they will purchase a golden gauge and other necessary tools to start learning the new business. Mzia thinks that her son will be a good goldsmith and he will have many orders. This will increase the income of the family. With the increased income they will be able to create better living conditions for the family members.

loans.use: to purchase a golden gauge and other necessary tools

loans.name: Blavi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de pagnes  et tissu depuis 2005 dans un quartier de la place, Madame Blavi est mariée à un chauffeur. Elle a en charge un enfant âgé de 06ans qui fréquente. Avec cette activité elle parvient à subvenir à ses moindres dépenses. Madame Blavi sollicite ce premier crédit de WAGES pour s’approvisionner en pagne de différentes variétés afin de mieux satisfaire ses clients. Elle veut épargner pour acheter un terrain, devenir grossiste, vivre dans l’aisance  avec sa famille.
texts.en:
A retailer of 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) in a local neighborhood, Ms. Blavi is married to a driver. She supports one child, 6 years old, who attends school. 

With this business, she is able to cover her lesser expenses. Ms. Blavi is requesting this initial loan to stock up on 'pagnes' of different types in order to satisfy her customers further. She wants to save money to buy a plot of land, become a wholesaler, and live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to buy 'pagne' cloth and fabrics

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a 28-year-old single lady who supports her schooling siblings. She has run a tailoring and clothing shop for the last three years, getting a monthly income of KES 20,000. 

She has applied for a loan of KES 20,000 from KADET LTD, with which she plans to restock her shop with a variety of fabric materials.


The anticipated profits will be ploughed back into the business for expansion. Her future dream is to be successful in life

loans.use: to purchase additional fabric for her tailoring shop.

loans.name: Harutyun

texts.en:
Harutyun is still farming. Thanks to his occupation he is able to provide for his family. Harutyun used his first Kiva loan to buy some chickens, rabbits, calves, piglets and fodder. Thanks to his farm development he bought a car which he uses to transport the farm's meat and milk products to food markets in Ijevan city. 

Now Harutyun is asking for a $3,000 loan to buy two more cows for his farm and also a large lot of fodder for his farm animals.

loans.use: To buy two more cows for his farm and also a large lot of fodder for his farm animals

loans.name: Baghdasar

texts.en:
Baghdasar and his family are still farming. Thanks to his agricultural business, Baghdasar is able to provide for his large family. 

He used his first Kiva loan to buy animal feed. Now he needs a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy a large lot of fodder for his farm animals.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of fodder for his farm animals.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 30 years old and from Cortes, Bohol. She is married with two children, ages 6 and 2, and a baby on the way. Her husband, Remegio Jr., works in Manila in a garment factory to support his family. 

Melanie helps in providing for her children by cooking snack food, which she sells in Cortes. She cooks rice cakes and pancakes for an income. She is also into raising hogs for a profit. 

She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients like flour, sugar, and sticky rice, and also hog feed. A loan will help support Melanie's business to be sustainable while meeting the needs of her two young children. 

Her income goes towards her family's healthy diet and reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like flour, sugar, and sticky rice, and also and hog feed.

loans.name: Antony Harold

texts.es:
Antony tiene 19 años de edad, vive en la alegre ciudad de Chincha, caracterizada por ser una de las ciudad de donde habitan la gran mayoría de descendientes afroperuano, es una ciudad en la cual se baila el festejo, el landó y la zamacueca, bailes muy típicos de nuestro país, sus pobladores son expertos en la preparación de comidas ya que tienen una buena sazón, podemos encontrar playas hermosas y sobre todo su clima es cálido. Cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta escuchar música y también realizar lectura de sus cursos ya que el está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Industrial y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos; también le gusta en algunas ocasiones comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cuales s la riquísima Carapulcra con sopa seca.

Día a día Antony trabaja como obrero en una empresa de venta de productos para construcción, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas diarias ya que en las noches acude a su centro de estudios; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable y sobre todo atiende bien a los clientes.

Antony está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracia a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales de estudio como libros, calculadora, separatas, maquetas, entre otros, de esta manera el podrá seguir estudiando y luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Culminar su carrera y tener un pequeño negocio”.
texts.en:
Antony is 19 years old and lives in the cheerful city of Chinca.  Chincha is noted for being a city with one of the largest Afro-Peruvian populations in the country.  It is a city in which people dance traditional dances such as the festejo, landó and zamacueca.  The local people are experts in preparing tasty food.  In this area we find beautiful beaches and, above all, a hot climate.  Whenever he has a little free time, Antony enjoys listening to music and reading course literature because he is studying for a degree in industrial engineering.  He covers his expenses through his work.  Antony also sometimes enjoys eating one of his favorite dishes: 'carapulcra con sopa seca'.

Antony works day by day as a worker for a company that sells building supplies.  He works around eight hours a day because he studies at night.  He believes that he is doing well in his work because he is responsible and serves customers well.

Antony is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy study materials such as books, a calculator, offprints, models, etc.  This will enable him to continue studying and working hard to make his biggest dreams come true: to finish his degree and own a small business.

loans.use: to buy study materials (books, a calculator, offprints, models, etc.)

loans.name: Pedro Joaquin

texts.es:
Pedro es un joven de 28 años de edad, casado, padre de un hijo de 4 años, su esposa lo apoya en su negocio, el cual vende comida diario por las tardes y por la mañana trabaja de acarreo en cargas oh botando basura el cual tiene su caballo con su carreta de estos ahorros comenzo la venta de comida, estando en mejores condiciones, al poder tener estas ventas, ya que de las ganancias nos surtimos para nuestro alimentos.
El todas las tarde tiene un lugar fijo en una rotonda de la capital, en donde ofrece variedad de comida en tacos, pollo asado, carne, salchichón, tajadas verdes y madura, gallopinto, refrescos y gaseosa, por tal razón está optando al financiamiento para poder hacer más variedad de comida en comprara: Carne, pollo, salchichón en mas cantidad, un quintal de arroz, azúcar, frijoles, bidón de aceite frutas y verduras para seguir ofertando sus ricos platillos, obteniendo la captación de más clientes y que gracias a Afodenic será posible la inversion.
texts.en:
Pedro is a 28-year-old young man. He is married and has a four-year-old son. His wife helps him with his business, where he sells food daily in the afternoons. In the morning he works as a freight carrier or hauling trash, for which he has a horse and cart. With the savings from this work he started selling food. His situation has improved with this business, since the sales profits allow him to provide sustenance for his family.
In the afternoons, he has a set spot at a roundabout in the capital, where he offers a variety of food: tacos, roast chicken, meat, sausage, fried green and ripe plantains, gallopinto (a rice and beans dish), soft drinks, and soda. He is requesting financing in order to be able to offer even more variety. He will purchase meat, chicken, greater quantities of sausage, 100 pounds of rice, sugar, beans, a large can of oil, fruits, and vegetables, so that he can continue offering his delicious dishes and gain more customers. Afodenic will make this investment possible.

loans.use: to purchase meat, chicken, sodas, fruit, and vegetables, in order to offer more food to sell.

loans.name: Wendyalgdo Group

texts.fr:
Mr  SALIFOU est responsable du groupe WENDYALDO. Marié, il est père d’un enfant, âgé de 02ans. Il ne va pas à l’école et il a 02 personnes en charge.

Mr vend des plats en plastiques  depuis 06ans. Il s’approvisionne au marché de Larlé et à Sankaryaaré. Ses clients sont les hommes et les femmes.

Il veut s’acheter  10 douzaines de bouillard et 10 douzaines de gobelet.

Mr veut investir ses bénéfices dans son activité. Il ambitionne  mieux agrandir son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Salifou is the representative of the Wendyaldo group. He is married and has a two-year-old child. He did not attend school and has two people under his care.

Salifou has worked selling plastic plates for the past six years. He gets his supplies in the market in Larlé and in Sankaryaaré. His customers are both male and female, and he plans to buy 10 dozen kettles and 10 dozen cups.

Salifou wants to invest his profits in his business. He plans to expand his business and improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To buy 10 dozen kettles and 10 dozen cups.

loans.name: Rognooma Group

texts.fr:
Mme MAMOUNATA est responsable du groupe ROGNOOMA. Mariée, elle est mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a08ans et le moins âgé a 02ans. Un va à l’école et elle a 02 personnes en charge.

Mme tisse et vend des pagnes tissés  depuis 03ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 10. Ses clients sont les hommes et les femmes.

Elle veut s’acheter  une balle de laine et  50 pagnes tissés.

Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices pour agrandir son activité. Elle ambitionne améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mamounata is the head of the Rognooma group. She is married, and has two children. Her oldest child is 8 and the youngest is 2, and one of them goes to school. She has two people under her care.

Mamounata has worked weaving and selling woven “pagnes” (traditional wrap-around cloth) for the past three years. She gets her supplies in a market in the area known as Sector 10, and her customers are both male and female. She wants to buy a ball of wool and 50 woven pagnes.

Mamounata wants to save her profits in order to expand her business, and she plans to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a ball of wool and 50 traditional woven wrap-around cloths.

loans.name: Arely Maria

texts.es:
Arely de 33 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de Estelí, casada, madre de dos hijos que están a su cargo, ella realizo estudios hasta quinto año de secundaria, de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de nacatamales desde hace 3 años. Inicio su negocio con dinero propio, anteriormente trabajaba en un restaurante de la comunidad a la edad de 28 años, de los ingresos que obtuvo de su trabajo decide establecer su propio negocio en su casa de habitación, este ha sido su primer negocio el cual saca adelante por si sola pues no tiene apoyo de nadie, Arely dice que se encuentra satisfecha con su venta de nacatamales ya que es un negocio rentable, genera ingresos diarios además cuenta con clientes fijos. 
Solicita el crédito para comprar leña, maíz, carne, cebolla, papas, etc. Toda la materia prima que se necesita para elaborar y darle el sabor a sus nacatamales, ella dice que el préstamo será de ayuda pues podrá invertir en su inventario, incrementara su producción y podrá obtener mejores ingresos para la familia, sus planes futuros es llegar a tener su casa propia para  tener un mejor nivel de vida y ser alguien independiente, sus metas próximas es diversificar su negocio en otros lugares de la comunidad, pues su deseo es llegar a ser una de las mejores comerciante de la zona con el objetivo de mejorar sus ganancias y poder ofrecerle una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en: Arely, 33 years old, lives in the town of Estelí. She is married and has two children who are in her charge. She studied until the fifth year of secondary school. She has been selling natacamales (steamed corncakes, a popular Nicaraguan dish) for 3 years. She started her business with her own money, earned while working at her previous job, a restaurant in the community. At 28, she decided to set up her own business with this money in the house where she lives. This is her first business, which she runs successfully on her own, since she is not helped by anyone. Arely says that she is satisfied with selling natacamales because it is a profitable business: she makes money every day and has many returning customers. She asks for this loan to buy firewood, sweetcorn, meat, onions, potatoes, etc. These are all the ingredients needed to make natacamales and give them flavour. She says that the loan will help her because it will enable her to invest in her inventory, increase production, and obtain a better income for her family. Her plans for the future include having her own home to be able to have a better standard of living and be independent. Her next goal is to establish her business in other places in the community, since she would like to become one of the most successful entrepreneurs in her area in order to increase her earnings and be able to give her children a better education.

loans.use: to buy firewood, sweetcorn, meat, onions, potatoes, etc.

loans.name: Tamara

texts.ru: Тамара-старается успевать во всем, так как она одна воспитывает своих маленьких детей.Её муж находится в России на заработках и видимо его дела идут плохо, что он не присылает семье деньги на проживание.Тамара откармливает крупно-рогатый скот и производит кисло-молочные продукты и продает их.Кроме того у неё дома постоянно есть молоко, чему её дети очень рады и сыты.Первый кредит она  использовала на покупку одной коровы и таким образом увеличила свое поголовье.Это ее основной доход и благодаря этим видом деятельности она намного улучшила свою жизнь.На полученный кредит она  хочет купить скот и дальше развивать свой бизнес. Сотрудничает с нашей организацией более 2 года.Целенаправленно использовала все кредиты и надеется работать с нами в дальнейшем.
texts.en: Tamara tries to succeed at everything because she is raising her small children by herself.  Her husband is working in Russia, and apparently things with him are not going well because he does not send money to the family for living expenses.  Tamara fattens up cattle and makes and sells dairy products.  Besides this, she always has milk at home, which makes her children happy and full.  She used her first loan to purchase one cow, which helped her to increase the livestock headcount.  This is her primary source of income, and, thanks to this business, she significantly improved her life.  She wants to use this loan to purchase livestock and continue developing her business.  Tamara has been working with our organization for over two years.  She used all of her loans as intended and hopes to work with us in the future.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Tamawe Group

texts.fr: Aidé par 09 personnes dans l’exécution de son activité (agriculture) Mr Katawili est né en 1965. Il est marié à une cultivatrice et ont ensemble 18 enfants dont 15 scolarisés. Il est à son troisième crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce prêt pour s’approvisionner en outils de travail afin d’avoir un bon rendement. Notons qu’il est dans ce domaine il y a 30ans et il maitrise bien les saisons pour savoir qu’elle récolte faire en cette période. Toute son activité est basée en RÉGION CENTRALE et il s'y plait bien car cela lui permet de nourrir la population en générale et sa famille en particulier. Avec les profits réalisés, il souhaiterait construire un logement, augmenter la superficie cultivable et prendre soin de la famille. Tous sont dans l’agriculture et leurs cultures se font en saison. Ils cultivent le mais, le riz, le sorgho et le soja. Les autres membres du groupe veulent assurer les besoins élémentaires de leurs familles.
texts.en:
Katawili was born in 1965, and is helped by nine people in his agricultural business. He is married to a farmer, and together they have 18 children, 15 of whom are at school. This is his third loan from WAGES, and he has requested the money to buy work tools so that he can have a good crop. 

Katawili has been working in this area for 30 years, and he is able to handle seasonal change well so he knows what crop to harvest in each period. His entire business is based in the Central Region, and he enjoys it because it allows him to provide food for the local population in general and his family in particular. 

Katawili would like to use his profits to build a house, increase the land on which he grows his crops, and take care of his family. Everyone works in agriculture, and their crops are seasonal. They grow corn, rice, sorghum and soybeans. The other members of the group want to make sure that their families’ basic needs are met.

loans.use: To buy work tools.

loans.name: Gbétogo Yvonne

texts.fr: Agée de 28 ans, Gbétogo Yvonne est mariée et mère d'un enfant non encore scolarisé. Elle a une buvette où elle vend des boissons de la SOBEBRA depuis 02 ans et fait ses approvisionnements dans les dépôts de SOBEBRA les plus proches de son fonds de commerce. Expérimentée dans le crédit, elle a fait recours au financement de Finadev en vue de renforcer son chiffre d'affaire et de répondre favorablement aux demandes de ses clients. L'intérêt généré par son activité lui permettra de participer aux dépenses du foyer et d'épargner.
texts.en:
Gbétogo Yvonne is 28 years of age, married, and has one child who is not yet in school. She has a refreshment stand where she has sold SOBEBRA-brand drinks for two years, and she gets her supplies from the SOBEBRA depots closest to her business. 

Gbétogo Yvonne has prior loan experience, and has requested financing from Finadev to increase her sales and meet customer demand. The interest generated by her business will allow her to contribute to paying the household expenses and to save.

loans.use: To buy 50 crates of assorted drinks.

loans.name: Léonie's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Léonie, la responsable, est âgée de 37 ans. Mariée et mère de 03 enfants scolarisés, elle a une boutique où elle vend des sacs et des chaussures dames depuis 03 ans. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. En vue de renforcer son fonds de commerce et de satisfaire la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev. Ce financement lui permettra de maximiser son profit et de participer à l'éducation de ses enfants. Léonie se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en:
This group has two members who jointly guarantee the loan. Léonie is the head of the group, and is 37 years of age. She is married and has three children who are at school.

Léonie has a store where she has sold bags and ladies’ shoes for the past three years. She obtains her supplies from one of the markets in Benin. To increase her working capital and meet the needs of her customers, she has requested and obtained a loan from Finadev. This loan will allow her to maximize her profits, and to provide for her children’s education. Léonie is pictured to the left in the photo.

loans.use: To buy 30 bags and 15 pairs of ladies’ shoes.

loans.name: Gavhar

texts.ru: Гавхар- женщина с высшим образованием.У неё семья, дети и любящий муж.Гавхар работает в частной школе преподавателем начальных классов.У неё достаточно опыта работы и стаж, любит и знает свою профессию очень хорошо.Её муж работает на мельнице  несколько лет и имеет постоянную работу.Хотя они работают непрерывно и имеют стабильный доход,семья не может накопить деньги на стройку своего дома. Им нужно  построить дополнительные комнаты для сыновей, они уже стали взрослые и скоро родители поженят их.Для таких расходов Гавхар с мужем решили обратится к нам за кредитом.Это её не первый кредит и она уже знает все условия кредитования и не подводила  нас.Старается целенаправленно использовать кредит  и вовремя  погашать.
texts.en: Gavhar is a woman with a higher education.  She has a family, children and a loving husband.  Gavhar works as an elementary school teacher at a private school.  She has plenty of work experience and tenure, loves and knows her trade very well.  Her husband has been working at a mill for several years and has a permanent job.  Despite the fact that they both work and have a stable income, the family has not been able to save money to build their home.  They need to build additional rooms for their sons because they have grown up and will soon be married.  Gavhar and her husband decided to request a loan from us for these expenses.  This is not her first loan, and she already knows all of the financing conditions and never violated them.  Gavhar tries to use the loans as intended and to repay them in a timely manner.

loans.use: to make housing repairs

loans.name: Zarrina

texts.ru: Зарина- мать троих взрослых детей.Недавно она женила двоих сыновей.У неё сейчас большое хозяйство и большие заботы, так как живут вместе большой семьей.Конечно все в семье работают и имеют свои доходы, но все равно семейные ресурсы хватают только на проживание.Накопить   денежные средства невозможно и поэтому она обратилась в нашу организацию за кредитом, чтобы покрыть свои крупные расходы.Первый кредит она использовала на ремонт своей квартиры перед свадьбой сыновей и своевременно погасила его.После этого она получила кредит на свадьбу.Очередной кредит запрашивает также на приготовление мероприятия, у неё взрослая дочь и планирует выдать её замуж,для этого она закупает  приданное и золотые изделия.Она благодарна нам за своевременную финансовую программу и надеется на постоянное сотрудничество.
texts.en: Zarrina is a mother of three adult children.  She recently married off two of her sons.  Right now, she has a large household and large expenses because they live together as a big family.  Of course, everyone in the family works and earns an income, but still the family resources are only enough for basic living expenses.  It is impossible to save money, and this is why Zarrina requested a loan from our organization in order to cover large expenses.  She used her first loan to make repairs to her apartment before her sons' weddings and repaid that loan timely.  Then, she obtained a loan for the wedding.  Zarrina is requesting this loan also to hold events.  She has an adult daughter and plans to marry her off, and needs to buy a dowry and gold jewelry for this purpose.  She is grateful to us for the timely financial program and hopes for a permanent partnership with us.

loans.use: to buy jewelry

loans.name: Aslam

texts.ru:
Аслам родился 1980 году в городке Дангара. Он живет с женой. У него двое маленьких детей. Аслам имеет среднее образование. Он занимается торговлей. Аслам начал свою деятельность с 2004 года. В то время он арендовал не большую торговую точку на рынке. Занимался малым предпринимательством.
Аслам на сегодняшний день арендует помещение рядом с домом, где он открыл продуктовый магазин. Он хочет увеличить товарооборот.
Аслам просит кредит на сумму 1050 долларов США для покупки продуктов и хозяйственных товаров.
texts.en: Aslam was born in 1980 in the city of Dangara.  He lives with his wife, and they have two small children.  Aslam has a secondary education.  He is involved in sales.  Aslam started his business in 2004.  At that time, he leased a small retail outlet at a market and was involved in a small entrepreneurship.  Today, Aslam leases a space near his home, where he opened a food store.  He wants to increase his goods turnover.  Aslam is requesting a loan in the amount of $1050 to purchase products and household goods.

loans.use: to purchase products and household goods

loans.name: Arnulfo Reyes

texts.es: Arnulfo tiene una venta de accesorios para celulares en Bastión Popular sector que en un principio fue un asentamiento ilegal de personas que querían tener una casa propia, pero por medio de conversaciones se oficializo en el municipio de la cuidad, tiene 11 años en el negocio el cual empezó al inicio del auge telefónico lo cual le ayudo ya que empezó a reunir su clientela. Poco después decidió comprar un local en la bahía de la ciudad un sector muy conocido por ser un nicho comercial, ahí empezó la reparación y venta de celular como artículos. Su horario de trabajo empieza desde las 10 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, no tiene ayudantes por lo que realiza el trabajo solo. En su local oferta, baterías, celulares, cargadores, estuches, audífonos, tarjetas de memoria y reparaciones. Arnulfo espera con el préstamo aumentar sus ventas aunque el sector es muy competitivo. Su sueño es tener un vehículo propio para viajar y pasar más tiempo con su familia.
texts.en: Arnulfo has a business selling cell phone accessories in Bastión Popular.  This area was originally an illegal settlement of people who wanted to own their own homes.  However, following talks, the city council decided to make it an official settlement.  Arnulfo has been in his business for 11 years.  He started it at the beginning of the cell phone boom which helped him to form his customer base.  Shortly afterwards, he decided to buy premises in the bay area of the city.  This area is very well known for being a commercial niche.  He started repairing and selling both cell phones and accessories.  Arnulfo starts work at 10 o'clock in the morning and works until 8 o'clock at night.  He doesn't have any assistants and works alone.  In his premises he sells batteries, cell phones, chargers, cases, earphones and memory cards.  He also offers repairs.  Arnulfo hopes to use his loan to increase his sales although the industry is very competitive.  His dreams are to own his own vehicle so that he can travel and to spend more time with his family.

loans.use: to buy batteries, cell phones, chargers, cases, earphones and memory cards

loans.name: Iuri

texts.en:
Iuri is 66 years old. He lives in a small village of Abasha District with his wife Eter. They are pensioners. They earn their living through their agricultural business with 4 milking cows and a pig. Eter milks cows twice a day and produces cheese. They sell it on the local open market. Iuri also sells piglets in nearby villages. They own a plot of land as well, where nuts and vegetables are grown. They sell 400 kg of nuts seasonally. The total average monthly income of the family is 500 Lari.

Iuri requested a loan to install an irrigation system on his plot. He will water the land and hopes to get more and better quality vegetables (tomatoes, cucumbers, potatoes and cabbage). This will increase the sales of the family. With increased income, they will be able to finance the education of their grandchild. Thus, they hope that living conditions of the family will be improved.

loans.use: to install an irrigation system

loans.name: Ludit Francisco

texts.es: Ludit de 39 años se dedica a la venta de artículos hechos en aluminio y vidrio, el taller lo abrió en su domicilio ubicado en las Orquídeas sector norte de Guayaquil. Aprendió de su hermano mayor quien se dedica  al mismo negocio, empezó como ayudante hasta que poco a poco fue aprendiendo y logro independizarse. En la actualidad trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, la labor lo realiza con un ayudante ya que lo necesita para el corte y ensamble de las piezas por ser frágiles. Tiene 10 años en el negocio y cuenta con mucha clientela a quienes les gusta su trabajo. Ludit está casado y tiene 2 hijos quienes estudian en la escuela. Con el préstamo va a comprar aluminio, vidrio prensado, caucho y pegamento con los cuales hace las vitrinas. Espera a futuro ampliar su taller mejorando su calidad de vida, su sueño es poder comprar un carro que le permita dar un mejor servicio.
texts.en: Ludit is 39 years old and works selling products made from aluminum and glass.  He opened his shop in his home, located in the Orquídeas sector north of Guayaquil.  He learned from his older brother, who works in the same business.  He began as a helper until little by little he continued learning and was able to achieve independence.  Currently he works from Monday to Saturday from 8am to 6pm.  He works with a helper since he needs one for the cutting and assembling of the pieces since they are fragile.  He has been working in the business for 10 years and he counts on many clients who like his work.  Ludit is married and has two children who study in school.  With the loan he is going to buy aluminum, pressed glass, rubber and adhesive which he will use to make windows.  He hopes in the future to grow his shop, improving his quality of life.  His dream is to be able to buy a car that will permit him to give better service.

loans.use: to buy aluminum, pressed glass, rubber and adhesive.

loans.name: 010103-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Nguyệt has a retail business selling seafood. She is requesting a loan to purchase seafood to make processed seafood.

Nguyệt is 48 years old and she is married with 3 children. She is the leader of a 7-member group, the 010103-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. Nguyệt supports 2 dependents with her business in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. One of her children is grown up.

In 2008, Nguyệt joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Nguyệt has successfully repaid 5 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nguyệt has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Nguyệt hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase seafood to make processed seafood.

loans.name: Ma. Miriam

texts.en:
Ma. Miriam is a 34-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol, Philippines. She has five young children, and their ages are 12, 10, 9, 5, and 3. She has been in the farming business together with her husband for 12 years now. They grow rice.
 
Ma. Miriam gives her best in providing support to her husband and in meeting the needs of the family, especially for their children. The farming business provides them with the income that they need for their sustenance and expenses.
 
Ma. Miriam is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy fertilizers for the crops that they grow. Also, she wants to renovate their house.
 
In the future, Ma. Miriam dreams of expanding their farming business in order to generate more income so that she can send her children to school for a bright future.
 
The additional income will be used to finance the family's daily needs, reinvest in her business, and save for future use.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her plants

loans.name: 010102-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Hồng operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish sauce. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish sauce for resale.

Hồng is 39 years old and married, with two children.  She supports two dependents with her business in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Hồng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  She says the main hardship that her business faces is the lack of capital.

Hồng is the leader of a five-member group, the 010102-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group.   In 2008, Hồng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business.  She has successfully repaid five loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Hồng hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase fish sauce for resale.

loans.name: 010104-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Lệ operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish sauce. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish sauce for resale.

Lệ is 31 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the leader of a 4-member group, the 010104-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. Lệ supports 2 dependents with her business in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2008, Lệ joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid 5 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for 8 years. The main hardship that Lệ faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Lệ hopes for her business to do well, to buy land of her own, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase fish sauce for resale.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en: Monica has a thriving bakery business in Cortes, Bohol. She is 42 years old and married. She has three children, and their ages are 7, 12 and 13. Her husband helps her bake the bread to sell. Monica knows that she can do more. Her only challenge is that she lacks the money to buy some ingredients. She is asking for a loan to buy flour, sugar, yeast, margarine, lard, baking powder and cooking oil. Her loan is just what she needs so she can further increase her production. Any income generated will be used for paying for her children's healthy diet and school fees and reinvesting in her business.

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar, yeast, margarine, lard, baking powder and cooking oil

loans.name: Emilienne's Group

texts.fr: Emilienne est la responsable d'un groupe composé de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Agée de 44 ans, elle est mariée et mère de cinq enfants scolarisés dans une école de la ville. Elle s'est spécialisée dans la vente des mèches, des sacs et des chaussures dames depuis quelques années. Elle se ravitaille dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. En vue de satisfaire les besoins de ses enfants et de creuser un puits dans leur maison, elle a sollicité et a bénéficié d'un financement auprès de Finadev. Emilienne se retrouve à gauche de la photo.
texts.en:
Emilienne is the supervisor of a group made up of two people who are mutual guarantors. 44 years old, she is married and the mother of five children, who attend a school in the town. She has concentrated on selling hair extensions, bags and ladies shoes for several years. She buys her supplies in one of Benin's markets.
In order to meet her childrens' needs, and to dig a well at their home, she requested and got a loan from Finadev. Emilienne is on the left in the photo.

loans.use: to purchase 2 boxes of hair extensions, 12 bags and 16 pairs of ladies shoes.

loans.name: Jose Alfonso

texts.es: Jose es un taxista de 52 años que vive en las Orquídeas, se decidió por dar este tipo de servicios cuando se quedo sin trabajo y por su edad no fue contratado en otra compañía. Desde el año 2009 se puso en contacto con una compañía legalizada de taxi solicitando empleo ya que tiene licencia profesional, lo llamaron y le alquilan un vehículo por el que paga diariamente una guardianía. En el trabajo le dan el vehículo desde las 6:30 de la mañana hasta las 11 de la noche cuando lo retorna a la compañía. Con el tiempo que tiene trabajando ya es conocido por lo que tiene cliente fijos quienes lo llaman solicitando el servicio, también realiza expresos para colegios y escuelas. Como todos sus compañeros de la compañía su mayor temor es encontrarse en una situación de secuestro express ya que se arriesga en gran parte su integridad, espera no encontrarse en esa situación ya que es el único sustento familiar. Jose está casado y tiene 3 hijos quienes depende de él.  Con el préstamo que está solicitando va a mejorar su vivienda comprando barrillas, cemento y arena ya que desea mejorar su calidad de vida. Su sueño a futuro es poder adquirir un vehículo propio para ya no tener que pagar guardianía y así tendría una mayor rentabilidad.
texts.en:
Jose is a 52 year old taxi driver who lives in las Orquídeas. He decided to be a taxi driver when he was out of work and because of his age, was not contracted with another company. In 2009 he contacted a legalized taxi company and applied for employment since he already has a professional license.  They called him and rented him a vehicle which he pays for daily for guardianship. 

At work he gets the vehicle from 6:30 am till 11 pm when he returns it to the company. Over the time he has been working he has become known and has fixed customers who call requesting service.  Jose also provides service for high schools and primary schools.  Like all his colleagues in the company, Jose's biggest fear is being in a hostage situation and risking a large part of their integrity.  He hopes not to be in that situation because he is the only provider for his family.

Jose is married with 3 children who depend on him. With the requested loan, he will improve his home by purchasing rods, cement and sand because he wants to improve their quality of life. Jose's future dream is to buy his own car and never have to pay for guardianship and thus would have higher returns.

loans.use: to buy rods, cement and sand.

loans.name: Jbar

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 62 years old and married, with two children.

Jbar has owned a grocery store since 2008, selling soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken, fish, dairy products, and detergents. He has sufficient experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers.  He knows their needs. He has a good reputation, and he is  well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting $3,000 loan in order to expand his shop and increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to expand his shop and increase its inventory

loans.name: Piabalo

texts.fr: Mr Piabalo est père 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. L’ainé a 08ans et le dernier 01ans. Il a appris la cuisine et l’exerce depuis 02ans dans une boutique. Sa difficulté est la mévente et il sollicite ce premier crédit de WAGES pour acheter des produits alimentaires, de la boisson et réaménager l’emplacement pour les clients. Dans l’avenir, il veut seconder son restaurant et contribuer à l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Piabalo is the father of 3 children, 2 of whom are at school. The eldest is 8 and the youngest 1 year old. He has learned to cook and has been doing that for 2 years in a shop. His problem is the recession, and he is seeking this first loan with WAGES in order to buy food products and drinks, and to redecorate the premises for his customers.
In the future, he wants to enhance his restaurant and to contribute to his childrens' education.

loans.use: to buy food products and to improve the premises.

loans.name: Berdimurod

texts.en:
Berdimurod is a man who likes to work hard.  He has many friends, and all of them love him because Berdimurod is kind, jolly, and smart. 

He has been a driver for more than 30 years. He serves local people as a taxi man.  He is very sociable, and that’s why he attracts a lot of clients. 

He has a lovely wife and a smart child. Berdimurod tries to do the best for them. He must do more to raise the level of his living conditions because it is more expensive as his child grows older. 

Berdimurod is asking a loan to repair his car. He needs your help and mercy.

loans.use: To repair his car.

loans.name: Rosa Agustina

texts.es: Rosa vive en Orquídeas ciudad norte de Guayaquil, en su sector cuenta con los servicios de agua, luz y alcantarillado. Vive en esta zona desde que por medio de un préstamo adquirió su casa. Rosa inicio su vida comercial haciendo cadenas de dinero a parientes y conocidos con lo cual solventaba la mayor parte de sus gastos. Pasado varios años de realizar este tipo de negocios logro reunir un capital con el cual pudo comprar ropa para empezar a vender ya que le pareció un negocio muy rentable. La venta la realiza sola desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde recorriendo los sectores y visitando a sus clientes ya que su negocio es informal. La venta que realiza es de blusas, pantalones y lencería tanto femenina como masculina obteniendo un costo de $ 4.00 en la venta de cada producto. El negocio que realiza le gusta mucho ya que le ha permitido superar sus dificultades financieras que tiene siendo madre soltera de 3 niños. Rosa espera obtener el crédito con el cual compraría más mercadería para la venta, su meta a futuro es abrir un bazar de manera estable para dedicarle más tiempo a su familia.
texts.en: Rosa lives in Orquídeas, a city to the north of Guayaquil.  In her neighborhood she has access to services for water, electricity and sewage.  She has lived in this area since she was able to acquire a loan for the purchase.  Rosa began her commercial life selling something similar to lottery tickets (cadenas de dinero) to family and friends.   She was able to take care of many of her bills in this way.  After several years of this type of work she was able to collect enough capital that she was able to buy clothing to sell, since this seemed to her a very marketable business.  She completes her sales between 8am and 3pm, traveling through various neighborhoods and visiting her clients since her business is informal.  The things that she sells include blouses, pants, and undergarments for both men and women.  She obtains a commission of $4 for every product she sells.  She enjoys her business very much since it allows her to overcome the financial challenges that she faces being a single mother of three children.  Rosa hopes to obtain a loan with which she will buy more merchandise for sale.  Her future goal is to open a permanent bazaar so that she can dedicate more time to her family.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, pants and lingerie.

loans.name: 010101-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mẫn operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish sauce. She is requesting a loan to purchase small fish and shrimp to make fish sauce.

Mẫn is 60 years old and she is married with 4 children. She is the leader of a 5-member group, the 010101-Hợp Tân- Hoằng Phụ-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. Mẫn supports 2 dependents with her business in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Two other children are grown up.

In 2008, Mẫn joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Mẫn has successfully repaid 8 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Mẫn faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Mẫn hopes to buy land of her own, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase small fish and shrimp to make fish sauce.

loans.name: Elvis Manfredo

texts.es:
Elvis, tiene 32 años de edad, tiene dos hijos y vive con su esposa e hijos en  una aldea cercana al municipio de Choloma, Cortes.
Elvis trabajo en una fábrica maquiladora y al quedar sin empleo decidió establecer su propio negocio por sus propios medios y manejarlo juntamente con su esposa. Hace 4 años empezó a vender productos de la canasta básica familiar como granos básicos, manteca, huevos, cereales, condimentos, abarrotes etc. Lo ha surtido poco a poco reinvirtiendo sus ganancias. El ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 10,000 Lempiras para surtir de más productos comestibles que le ayuden a incrementar sus ventas y sus ganancias. Todo el esfuerzo que hace es para mantener siempre una fuente de ingresos para su familia y hacer que su negocio crezca más.
texts.en:
Elvis is 32 years old, and he has two children.  He lives with his wife and children in a village close to the Choloma municipality in Cortes.

Elvis worked in an assembly plant.  When he was left without employment he decided to set up his own business through his own resources.  He decided to run the business together with his wife.  Four years ago he started to sell basic needs products like basic grains, lard, eggs, cereals, condiments, and other groceries, etc.  He has stocked it little by little by reinvesting his earnings.

He has decided to request a loan for 10,000 lempiras in order to stock more food products.  These products will help him to increase his sales and his income.  All of the effort that he puts forth is to always maintain a source of income for his family and to make his business grow more.

loans.use: to stock his business with basic needs food products.

loans.name: Smas

texts.en:
Smas, aged 49, is a hammock weaver who permanently lives in the Reussey Keo district with her husband and three single children, while the other two children are married and live separately. Smas got involved in the weaving business in order to help her husband earn some additional income for the family. She has been doing this for almost seven years and can earn approximately 2.00 USD per day. Smas’ husband is a vendor, selling kitchen supplies in various places around his district. 

Smas would like to borrow some funds from Kiva lenders to purchase kitchen supplies to support her husband’s business. This will enable Smas’ husband to increase his business activities and income. She hopes that she is able to experience a better standard of living since she and her husband strive to work hard.

loans.use: To purchase kitchen supplies to support her husband’s retail business

loans.name: 01.06.06 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Anh has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase household commodities in general to resell.

Anh is 35 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the 01.06.06 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of 7 members. She lives with 2 dependents and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province. 

In 2011, Anh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. The main hardship that Anh faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Anh hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase household commodities in general to resell

loans.name: Noapéli

texts.fr: Infirmière de profession depuis 2000, Madame Noapéli est marié à un tâcheron dans une société de la place. Ils ont ensemble un adorable enfant âgé de 02ans. Pour prêter main forte à son mari dans les  charges du foyer, elle a décidé par vendre des produits génériques à domicile à ses patients. Deux personnes l’aident et elle sollicite ce second crédit de chez nous pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle veut agrandir son centre de santé, devenir grossiste des produits génériques. Comme perspectives d‘avenir, elle veut réaliser des bénéfices afin  de contribuer aux dépenses dans l’éducation de leur enfant au coté de son mari.
texts.en:
A qualified nurse since 2000, Noapéli is married to a local labourer. They have an adorable 2 year old child. In order to assist her husband with the household expenses, she decided to sell generic products to her patients from her home. Two people assist her and she is seeking this second loan with WAGES to buy stock.
She wants to grow her health centre, and become a wholesaler of generic products. As to the future, she wants to generate a profit in order to contribute, alongside her husband, to her child's education.

loans.use: to purchase generic pharmaceutical products.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
Maria  tiene 59 años de edad, esta casada y su esposo trabaja como comerciante,   tiene 1 hijo de 26 años el cual ya es independiente, vive en una colonia de la Ciudad de San Pedro Sula.
Maria, tiene su negocio de pulpería el cual estableció con su propio capital hace 12 años, y vende productos de la canasta básica como frijoles, arroz, harina, manteca, café, cal, pan ,lácteos, churros, refrescos, agua en bolsa. Su negocio tiene bastante movimiento ya que esta ubicado en una zona de mucha afluencia de personas, y las ventas que obtiene le generan buenas ganancias. Ella atiende su negocio todo el día. 
Ha logrado mantener surtido su negocio con las ganancias obtenidas y actualmente esta solicitando su primer préstamo de 15000  lempiras para  poder abastecerse de producto como azúcar, manteca, frijoles, arroz, frescos, pan, lácteos, café, carnes, churros, confites y maseca. 
Su plan en el futuro es tener un mejor local y ampliar más su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria is 59 years old and married.  Her husband works as a merchant.  She has one child, age 26, who is now independent.  She lives in a neighborhood in the city of San Pedro Sula.

Maria has a grocery store business, which she established with her own money 12 years ago.  She sells basic needs food products like beans, rice, flour, lard, coffee, lime powder, bread, dairy products, churros, soft drinks, and water in bags.  

Her business has plenty of movement because it is located in an area with a lot of people.  The sales she makes generate good income.  She tends to her business all day.  She has managed to keep her business stocked by using the income she received.

She is currently requesting her first loan for 1,500 lempiras.  With the loan she will be able to stock products like sugar, lard, beans, rice, soft drinks, bread, dairy products, coffee, meat, churros, candy, and instant corn flour.

Her plan for the future is to have a better place and to expand her business more.

loans.use: to buy products like sugar, lard, beans, rice, soft drinks, bread, dairy products, coffee, meat, churros, candy, and instant corn flour in order to stock her business.

loans.name: Jesutin Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JESUTIN est composé de seize personnes qui se connaissent dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Anne Clarisse est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Anne Clarisse est âgée de 41 ans et vit au Bénin. Anne Clarisse a arrêté l’école au niveau universitaire. Anne Clarisse est mariée à un certain Didier. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à charge. Le couple assure ensemble les divers besoins du ménage. Afin d’assurer ses divers besoins, Anne Clarisse vend depuis sept ans, des produits de médecine traditionnelle, des liqueurs et des produits vivriers à son domicile. Anne Clarisse s’approvisionne dans une région et dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Anne Clarisse sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe JESUTIN, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The JESUTIN group comprises sixteen people who all know each other from the same region in Bénin. The group representative, whose name is Anne Clarisse, has her hand raised in the photo.
Anne Clarisse is 41 years old and lives in Bénin. She left school after university. She is married to a man named Didier. They have two children together, both attend school and live at home. In addition to their own children, they also have another child living with them. They cover the various household costs between them. In order to do this, Anne Clarisse has sold, for the last seven years, traditional medicine products, liqueurs and food from her home. She buys her supplies in a market in an area of Bénin.
In order to meet her customers' demand, and to increase her turnover and profit, Anne Clarisse is seeking - together with the other members of the JESUTIN group, a third loan with ALIDé. The previous two have both been repaid.

loans.use: to buy traditional medicine products, liqueurs and food.

loans.name: Guram

texts.en:
Guram is 62 years old. He lives in a small village of Chokhatauri District with his wife Marina.  Marina is a coach and is paid fees for the work.

Guram is busy with his agricultural business. He has a plot of land where he grows nuts. He picks nuts in late summer and sells them on the local open market.  Guram also has a car, and he offers taxi services to the local population.   The familly's average monthly income is 580 Lari.

Guram requested a loan to buy a milk cow.   He plans to expand his agricultural business that way. He will milk the cow twice in a day, and he will produce cheese. He will sell the milk and cheese on the local open market. 

This will increase the income of the family. With increased income, they will be able to renovate and equip their house, because it is old and uncomfortable. The living conditions of the family will improve accordingly. After hard working days, Guram and his wife will be able to spend their evenings in a more comfortable environment.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow to start a dairy business.

loans.name: 01.06.07 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Vân works in agriculture, raising poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell.

Vân is 60 years old, and she is married, with three children.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents; her children are grown up.

In 2006, Vân joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Vân has successfully repaid one previous loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Vân has been involved in her business for five years.  One critical business difficulty that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Vân hopes to remodel her house.  She hopes for her children to find a good job and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase poultry to raise and sell.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es: Mary  es socia del Banco Comunal Florecer. Tiene 29 años de edad, es casada y madre de 2 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 4 años. Mary es dueña de una estética de belleza en su propia vivienda y también vende regalos. Ella se siente exitosa porque gracias a las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal aprendió a ahorrar y también le ayudan mucho a saber manejar su negocio y a valorarse a sí misma. Está agradecida con la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que le ofrece. Mary invertirá el nuevo préstamo que solicita en la compra de tintes de pelo, máquina de cortar cabello, insumos para peluquería y regalos para su tienda.
texts.en:
Mary is a member of the Communal Bank "Florecer."  She is 29 years old, married and the mother of 2 children. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for 4 years. Mary owns a beauty salon in her own home and also sells gifts. 

She feels successful because thanks to the training received in the communal bank, she has learned to save.  It helps a lot to know how to manage her own business and value herself.  Mary is grateful to the institution for the loan facilities offered. Mary will invest the new loan request in buying hair dye, an electric razor, salon supplies and gifts for her store.

loans.use: Purchase hair dyes, hair cutting machine, supplies for hairdressers and gifts for your shop tienda

loans.name: Flavia

texts.es: Flavia es socia del Banco Comunal Florecer. Tiene 58 años de edad, es casada y madre de 4 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 3 años. Se dedica a la venta de hojas medicinales de coca, y también a la siembra, cosecha y venta de maíz, por otro lado se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno y ovino fuera de la ciudad. Está agradecida con la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que le ofrece. Ella dice que las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal son muy buenas ya que ellas le dejan mensajes motivadores. Flavia invertirá el nuevo préstamo que solicita en la compra de semillas de maíz, el pago de sus trabajadores y en el transporte de carga de su mercadería.
texts.en: Flavia is a member of the Banco Comunal Florecer [Community Bank "Florecer"]. She is 58 years old, married, and the mother of 4 children. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for the past 3 years. She works selling medicinal coca leaves and also planting, harvesting, and selling corn. In addition, she also raises cattle and sheep outside of the city. She is grateful to the institution for the loan opportunities offered. She says that the training she receives from the Banco Comunal [Community Bank] is very good, because they give her motivating messages. Flavia will use the new loan that she is asking for to purchase seed corn, to pay her workers, and to transport her goods.

loans.use: to purchase seed corn, pay her workers, and transport her goods

loans.name: Tojiniso

texts.ru:
Точинисо портниха. Она имеет средне - специальное образование. Точинисо более двадцати пяти лет занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Ей нравится ее работа. Точинисо предоставляет услугу у себя дома. Она берет заказы на дому. В этом ей помогает ее старшая дочь. На сегодняшний день у Точинисо много клиентов. 
Точинисо 43 года. Она проживает в городе Дангара. Точинисо живет вместе с мужем. Ее старший сын работает, двое других сыновей учатся в Вузах. А трое дочерей учатся в школе. 
Точинисо просит кредит для приобретения еще одной швейной машинки. Она надеется на Вашу помощь.
texts.en: Tojiniso is a seamstress.  She has a secondary-specialized education.  Tojiniso has been involved in sewing national dresses for over twenty-five years.  She likes her work.  Tojiniso provides this service and accepts work orders at home.  Her oldest daughter helps her with this business.  Today, Tojiniso has many clients.  Tojiniso is 43 years old.  She lives in the city of Dangara together with her husband.  Her oldest son works, and two other sons attend universities.  And her three daughters attend a school.  Tojiniso is requesting this loan to purchase another sewing machine.  She relies on your help.

loans.use: to purchase another sewing machine

loans.name: Iyad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 35 years old and married, with one child.

Iyad has owned a food market since 2008, selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He has sufficient experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers.  He knows their needs. He has a good reputation and is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting $3,000 loan in order to buy a big generator. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a big generator.

loans.name: Gloria Patricia

texts.es:
